entry.title: DW - US ammunition factories working overtime to supply Ukraine

link.title: DW - US ammunition factories working overtime to supply Ukraine

entry.summary: DW was granted rare access to one of just two US factories working overtime to keep up with soaring Ukrainian demand for weapons, the Ammunition Plant in Scranton, Pennsylvania. I went and saw shells stacked to the ceiling.
